name: Hallowed Grounds
description:
In the heart of winter people seek refuge in a cozy lodge haunted by a friendly poltergeist. As tired skiers and weary hikers relax next to the fire you can brighten their day with a warm cup of coffee and a song. 

Originally made in 2 weeks for Seattle Indies' Slow Jam 2021

Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys to Move
E to Possess/Drop Highlighted Objects
F to Fill Coffee Cups

Credits:

Andres G Nelson - Art
fluffy - Music
Moon Catcher - Programming
Seth Paxton - Design
